introduction.subTitle: Easily and quickly build your business presence into Facebook community
introduction.proPoints:
- No credit card required 
- Easy setup 
- Cancel anytime
introduction.resume: Make your first steps with PrestaShop Facebook!
introduction.proPoint1Description: Organize and manage your business Pages and ad accounts in one place.
introduction.proPoint2Description: Use data from Facebook Pixel to understand actions people take on your website.
introduction.proPoint3Description:
Manage your product catalog and 
unlock the power of ads.
introduction.proPoint4Title: Create and optimize better shopping experience
introduction.proPoint4Description: Thanks to the automatic synchronisation of the product catalogue and the mapping of your categories have an updated and more efficient Facebook catalogue.

messages.unknownOnboardingError: An unknown error occurred during onboarding process. Please reload and try again.

notConnected.title: Connect your store to Facebook
notConnected.description: With PS Facebook enjoy a frictionless, codeless onboarding and management experience for Facebook business products.
notConnected.details:
- Create/Select business 
- Create/Select page 
- Create/Select ad account 
- Create/Select install pixel 
 - Create/Select sync product catalog 
 - Create Facebook Shop & Instagram Shopping 
- Customize your Facebook Page with call-to-action

connected.description: You authorize this Facebook account to connect to your store:
connected.unlinkModalText: You are about to remove Facebook Business Extension. You will no longer have access to the stored settings of Facebook.

glass.text: You don’t see Facebook secured browser? We help you relaunch the window to finish configuration. You may need to activate popup windows in your browser to continue.

catalogSummary.categoryMatchingIntro: To enhance your catalog and help customers discover your items online, enter a Facebook product category (FPC) for your items and then add more information specific to each category. We recommend that you choose the most specific category possible that applies to each item to help customers understand what type of item you’re selling.
catalogSummary.categoryMatchingNotice: You [1]must[/1] choose at least one of these category types: 1) to use onsite Facebook checkout and 2) to enhance your catalog with category-specific attributes. Both category types are optional, but conditionally required.
catalogSummary.catalogExportIntro: Before buyers can purchase items from you, you'll need to upload your products information into a Facebook Product Catalog. A catalog is a container that holds information about the items you want to advertise or sell across Facebook and Instagram.
catalogSummary.catalogExportWarning: By sharing your catalogue, you agree PrestaShop may send all information related to the catalog products to Facebook.
catalogSummary.reportingIntro: It can take up to 24h for your PrestaShop product information to sync to Facebook. Once products are published you can start tagging them on Instagram or create Facebook ads.
catalogSummary.exportCatalogStatusDone: Your product catalog is now synced!

categoryMatching.title: Enhance your catalog : category mapping
categoryMatching.intro: To enhance your catalog and help customers discover your items online, enter a Facebook product category (FPC) for your items and then add more information specific to each category. We recommend that you choose the most specific category possible that applies to each item to help customers understand what type of item you’re selling.

autocomplete.tooManyResults: Too many results, please complete your search.
autocomplete.fetchError: An error occurred during search process.

ig_shopping.name: Instagram shopping
ig_shopping.description: Instagram Shopping gives your business an immersive storefront for people to explore your best products.

messenger_chat.name: Messenger Chat Plugin
messenger_chat.description: The Chat Plugin allows you to integrate your Messenger experience directly into your website.

page_shop.name: Facebook Shop
page_shop.description: Facebook Page shop allows you to list products you're selling and connect with more customers on Facebook.

page_cta.name: Call-to-action
page_cta.description: Add a button on your Facebook Page to get people to take an action from your page such as your shop.

headings.availableFeatures: To boost sales, add to your shop...

warning.productsNotSynced: You first need to import your product catalog so you will be able to set up Facebook Shop and Instagram Shopping and also create ad campaigns.
warning.disableFeatureModalText: You are about to disable this feature. This may limit some functionality.
warning.noFeatures: Features could not be retrieved from Facebook. This may be caused by the token expiration and can be fixed by restarting the onboarding.
